      • createXAResource

        public XAResource createXAResource(Executor taskExecutor,
                          Problem.Severity maxSeverity)
        Create a new XA resource to use with this resource manager. The XA resource may be used to enlist in a transaction, or to perform recovery tasks.
        Parameters:
        taskExecutor - the task executor to use for transactions created by this resource
        maxSeverity - the maximum severity to configure for transactions created by this resource
        Returns:
        a new XA resource

      • createRecoveryXAResource

        public XAResource createRecoveryXAResource()
        Create a new XA resource which can only be used for recovering and completing transactions, not initiating them.
        Returns:
        a new XA resource
